content:
No, the duck wasn't stalking or beating the fire out of someone-- but now a New York man has been legally barred from being near the animal (or her human handlers).
Circles, the 17-year old bird, had a bullet removed from her voice box after a group of "young people" (whatever that means) bounded over Janet Lippincott's fence on March 17th.
While I would typically ascirbe this sort of hooliganism to 10-year-olds, the order was issued against a 21-year old whose name was not released, leaving me to wonder why he wasn't pursuing the 
, and instead attempting to storm the neighbor's duck pond.
Nevertheless, I'm sure the "young man," whoever he is, will have plenty of time to contemplate his poor choice of hobbies; he's plead not guilty to a 
.
title: Duck Gets Restraining Order
author: whatsrequired
